廀字的基本解释

廀
sōu
古同“廋”。

廀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sōu］
［《廣韻》所鳩切，平尤，生。］
亦作“廀1”。
(1)藏匿，隐藏。
(2)隐语。
(3)指廋人。
(4)弯曲处。
(5)通“搜”。参见“廋索”、“廋疏”。

廀字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廀； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页348第22
【廣韻】蘇后切，音叟。【廣雅】隈也。【劉向·九歎】步從容於山廀。【王逸註】廀，隈也。言徐步山隈也。　又與廋通。【孟子】若是乎，從者之廀也。【註】侍從者所竊匿也。

廀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
廀字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
sōu
The ancient same as "廋".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sōu]
["Guangyun" was cut, Pingyou, and born. ]
Also known as "廀1".
(1) Hiding, hiding.
(2) Hidden language.
(3) Refers to the Ling people.
(4) Bend.
(5) Link "Search". See "Lin Suo", "Lin Shu".
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廀; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 348 22
[Guang Yun] Su Hou cut, sound old. [Guangya] Kuma. [Liu Xiang·Jiu Tan] Step calmly in the mountains. [Wang Yi's Note] 廀, Kuma. Said step by step Yamakuma.　And 廋linked again. [Mencius] If so, the follower is also the best. [Note] Also hidden by the attendant.
